subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Barry Bonds's home run chase is again a home run hobble since hitting his 713th homer last Sunday. Perhaps Bonds needs a rest from his stagnant pursuit of Babe Ruth's 714 home runs.
snippet: Barry Bonds's home run chase is again a home run hobble since hitting his 713th homer last Sunday. Perhaps Bonds needs a rest from his stagnant pursuit of Babe Ruth's 714 home runs.
